channel.title: Easy RSC ( Few Questions )
channel.description:
Question One ( Template in Players Map )
Editing Starter items.
How my files look right now. [code]ia1=1 ia0=1 ia2=1 ia3=1 ia4=1 ia5=1 ia6=1[/code]
and for the item id's
[code]i0=1263 i1=87 i2=156 i3=166 i4=376 i5=70 i6=4[/code]
I Cant figure out wats wrong with this... ? help please.
( More Questions will Follow )

ia6=1

I’d take a GUESS that it should be ia0 before ia1, never looked at (and never will) the source code for easyrsc though.

item.title: Easy RSC ( Few Questions )
item.dc:creator: @rocky_rose rocky_rose
item.description:
@rocky_rose wrote:

I have never used EasyRSC before so I’m not sure if this will work.

Open up the Template file and search for:

icount=1

Change it to:

icount=7

If I’m right, this counts all the items you start with in your server (in this case 7). If you add or remove some of the starter items, you have to increase/decrease the amount of items you added/removed to the icount. If this doesn’t work, I’ll try and fix up a Template file with those items for you.

Also, if you have anymore questions, be sure to use the search button and check out this thread, which has many tutorials for EasyRSC which might answer some of your questions. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363007.0.html
If you look through some of the other pages in that thread, you can find more tutorials in case the first page doesn’t help.

Read full topic
